# Measurement.FormatStyle.UnitWidth

**Structure**

Specifies the width of the unit, determining the textual representation.

## Declaration

```swift
struct UnitWidth
```

## Unit widths

- **wide**: A unit width that shows the full unit name.
- **abbreviated**: An abbreviated unit width.
- **narrow**: The shortest unit width.

## Modifying a measurement format style

- **width**: The width of the measurement unit.
- **numberFormatStyle**: The formatting of the measurement value.
- **usage**: The intended purpose of the formatted measurement.
- **hidesScaleName**: The visibility of the unit name of a temperature.
- **locale**: The locale of the format style.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
